Name: Pyroblast Surge
Story Background: In the heat of battle, a fiery mage harnesses the power of the elements to unleash a devastating attack.
Ability: Pyroblast Surge deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If you control a Mountain, Pyroblast Surge deals 1 additional damage.
Appearance Description: The card art shows a mighty burst of flames erupting from the hands of a cloaked figure, engulfing its target in a fiery inferno.
